main.name: Shadab Anwar
main.bio: Hello there! I’m Shadab, a Frontend Developer and a student at NIT Rourkela, passionate about crafting seamless and engaging web experiences. As a Technical Team member of Webwiz.NITR, the official Web Development club of NIT Rourkela, I actively contribute to several live projects, including HackOdisha, a collaborative initiative pushing innovation forward. Beyond coding, I take pride in organizing HackOdisha, fostering a dynamic tech community. Constantly learning and evolving, I thrive on building impactful solutions. Let’s connect and explore how my expertise can bring value to your next project!

education.school: National Institute of Technology, Rourkela - India

work.title: Technical Team Member
work.description: Contributed to Webwiz.NITR, the official Web Development club of NIT Rourkela, by building and enhancing live projects. Developed dynamic user interfaces using React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. Collaborated with teams to integrate APIs for seamless functionality. Led deployment strategies to ensure scalability and reliability.

work.title: Organiser and Technical Team Member
work.description: Built robust, cross-platform web pages and interactive components to enhance the HackOdisha 4.0 website. Led PR efforts, onboarded partners like IIT Kharagpur, and implemented innovative strategies to boost event visibility. Played a key role in organizing a successful hackathon with 2500+ participants, ensuring smooth operations.

projects.title: News.ly (Next JS, React JS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Clerk, API's)
HackOdisha4.0 (Next JS, React JS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS)
ClassHub (React JS, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, FirebaseAuth, FirestoreDatabase)
HackOdisha3.0-Clone (Next js, React js, Tailwind CSS)
